Title: One Breath
Plot: Scully mysteriously appears in a Washington hospital, alive but in a coma, and Mulder must fight to keep her alive in order to find out what happened to her and who did it to her. Meanwhile, Scully fights her own personal battle as she decides whether to stay or go on to the next world.
GuestStars: Melinda McGraw, Jay Brazeau, Nicola Cavendish, Lorena Gale, Ryan Michael, Tegan Moss, Don S. Davis
